mapper.insert: insert into t_goods_class (class_code, class_name, last_class_code, remark, is_deleted, create_name, create_time, version ) values (#{classCode}, #{className}, #{lastClassCode}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted}, #{createName}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_goods_class set class_name = #{className}, remark = #{remark}, update_name = #{updateName}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where class_code = #{classCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select count(goods_code) from t_goods where class_second_code = #{classCode} and is_deleted = 0

select a.class_code, a.class_name, b.class_code as classSecondCode, b.class_name as classSecondName from t_goods_class a LEFT JOIN t_goods_class b on (a.class_code = b.last_class_code and b.last_class_code is NOT NULL and b.is_deleted = 0) where a.last_class_code is null and a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.update: update t_goods_class set is_deleted = 1, update_time = now(), update_name = #{updateName}, version = version + 1 where class_code = #{classCode}
mapper.select: select class_code classCode, class_name className, last_class_code lastClassCode, is_deleted isDeleted, remark remark, create_time createTime, create_name createName, update_time updateTime, update_name updateName, version version from t_goods_class where class_code = #{classCode} and is_deleted = 0
